children.description: Authentihash of the file.

children.description: Capabilities tags.

children.description: Embedded domains found in the file.

children.description: Embedded IP addresses found in the file.

children.name: embedded_urls
children.description: Embedded URLs found in the file.

children.name: exif_info
children.description: Exif metadata from different file formats extracted by exiftool.

children.name: file_metadata
children.description: Deprecated. Metadata associated with the file.

children.name: file_type
children.description: The type of the file.

children.name: first_seen_time
children.description: Timestamp the file was first seen in the customer's environment.

children.name: first_submission_time
children.description: First submission time of the file.

children.name: full_path
children.description: The full path identifying the location of the file on the system.

children.name: last_analysis_time
children.description: Timestamp the file was last analysed.

children.name: last_modification_time
children.description: Timestamp when the file was last updated.

children.name: last_seen_time
children.description: Timestamp the file was last seen in the customer's environment.

children.name: last_submission_time
children.description: Last submission time of the file.

children.name: main_icon
children.description: Icon's relevant hashes.

children.name: md5
children.description: The MD5 hash of the file, as a hex-encoded string.

children.name: mime_type
children.description: The MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) type of the file.

children.name: names
children.description: Names fields.

children.name: pdf_info
children.description: Information about the PDF file structure.

children.name: pe_file
children.description: Metadata about the Portable Executable (PE) file.

children.name: prevalence
children.description: Prevalence of the file hash in the customer's environment.

children.name: security_result
children.description: Google Cloud Threat Intelligence (GCTI) security result for the file.

children.name: sha1
children.description: The SHA1 hash of the file, as a hex-encoded string.

children.name: sha256
children.description: The SHA256 hash of the file, as a hex-encoded string.

children.name: signature_info
children.description: File signature information extracted from different tools.

children.name: size
children.description: The size of the file in bytes.

children.name: ssdeep
children.description: Ssdeep of the file.

children.name: stat_dev
children.description: The file system identifier to which the object belongs.

children.name: stat_flags
children.description: User defined flags for file.

children.name: stat_inode
children.description: The file identifier. Unique identifier of object within a file system.

children.name: stat_mode
children.description: The mode of the file. A bit string indicating the permissions and privileges of the file.

children.name: stat_nlink
children.description: Number of links to file.

children.name: tags
children.description: Tags for the file.

children.description: Vhash of the file.
